oracle.pg.common

Class ParametersBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.ParametersBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Parameters

    public class ParametersBase
extends java.lang.Object
    An Oracle Utility to get additional property graph configuration settings taken from JVM settings.

      ParametersBase()

      Returns a pre-created instance of a ParametersBase object.

      Validates if wild cards are enabled when executing queries based on a key value pair.

      Determines if the Super verbose logging is enabled

    • Method Detail

      • getAllowedCharactersForSimpleFileNames

        public java.lang.String getAllowedCharactersForSimpleFileNames()
        Determines the list of allowed characters used for simple file names
        Returns:
        a String with the concatenation of all allowed characters for simple file names.

      • getCharset

        public static java.lang.String getCharset()
        Returns the default charset

      • getInstance

        public static ParametersBase getInstance()
        Returns a pre-created instance of a ParametersBase object.

      • getUseWildcards

        public boolean getUseWildcards()
        Validates if wild cards are enabled when executing queries based on a key value pair.
        Returns:
        true if wild cards are enabled, else return false.

      • isSuperVerboseOn

        public boolean isSuperVerboseOn()
        Determines if the Super verbose logging is enabled
        Returns:
        true if the super verbose logging is enabled

      • showProgress

        public boolean showProgress()
        Determines if the show progress logging is enabled
        Returns:
        true if the show progress logging is enabled

      • syncCache

        public boolean syncCache()
        Returns true if the underlying vertex cache and edge cache are synchronized
